title: Ezra Arrives in Jerusalem
summary: Ezra, a skilled scribe and priest, receives permission from King Artaxerxes to return to Jerusalem. The king provides gifts and authority for Ezra to teach and enforce Godâ€™s law in the land.

faq.question: Who was Ezra?
faq.answer: A priest and scribe skilled in the Law of Moses and devoted to serving God.

faq.question: What did Artaxerxes authorize Ezra to do?
faq.answer: To appoint leaders, teach the Law, and enforce justice in Judah.
